mapper.select: SELECT room.room_id AS roomId , room.room_name AS roomName , g.user_id AS userId , msg.message AS lastMessage , msg.created_date AS lastMessageTime , (select count(*) from chat_message mm where mm.room_id = g.room_id and mm.message_id > g.last_read_message_id) AS unreadMessagesCount FROM chat_group g INNER JOIN chat_room room ON g.room_id = room.room_id INNER JOIN chat_message msg ON g.room_id = msg.room_id AND msg.message_id = (select MAX(message_id) from chat_message m where m.room_id = g.room_id) WHERE g.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY lastMessageTime DESC

SELECT room.room_id AS roomId , room.room_name AS roomName , g.user_id AS userId , msg.message AS lastMessage , msg.created_date AS lastMessageTime , (select count(*) from chat_message mm where mm.room_id = g.room_id and mm.message_id > g.last_read_message_id) AS unreadMessagesCount FROM chat_group g INNER JOIN chat_room room ON g.room_id = room.room_id INNER JOIN chat_message msg ON g.room_id = msg.room_id AND msg.message_id = (select MAX(message_id) from chat_message m where m.room_id = g.room_id) WHERE g.user_id = #{userId} AND room.room_id = #{roomId}

SELECT u.user_id AS userId , u.email AS email , u.name AS name , f.url AS profileUrl FROM chat_group g INNER JOIN users u ON g.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN upload_file f ON u.profile_image_id = f.file_id WHERE g.room_id = #{roomId}
